categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Havoc" was the nickname of a clone trooper who served during the Clone Wars in the Grand Army of the Republic's Tango Company.
Havoc wore Phase I clone trooper armor with blue markings that were consistent with his unit. Havoc had longer sideburns and facial hair in the form of a goatee. He utilized a DC-15A blaster carbine.
